chapter.title: Next Steps
chapter.para: This user guide has provided a thorough explanation of features and terminologies within &PRODUCT;. Now that you know how to create, manage and publish web content and administer a website based on &PRODUCT;, you may have more questions or want to get involved. The following links can connect you with resources to learn more and contribute to the open source development process.
